question: You are a current student of Loren Brusque University, studying Business Administration. You want to apply for the post of Quality Assurance Manager you have recently seen on the university's notice board.Write a letter to Mr. Walker, and    Give your reason for writing    Tell about your education    Describe your work experience and explain why you would be suitable for the job.
text: I am writing this letter in regard to applying for the post of Quality Assurance Manager which was advertised on the Business Department notice board.

Currently, I am studying a Business Management Program and graduating in 2023. My core subjects are related to the field of production and supply chain. Additionally, my degree also includes a course on communication skills as one of the basics of management.

During my studies, I held the post of junior sales representative for a local supermarket. While working there, I improved my leadership skills and ability to work in a team. Apart from that, I worked closely with the quality assurance manager and gained valuable knowledge on how the process of quality assurance works. Therefore, I stand as a perfect candidate for the post.
I am available for an interview at any time. You can contact me via my mobile phone given below.
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to meeting you in the nearest future.
